name: Final Escape
description:
Controls

  • WASD or Arrow Keys
  • Mouse and Click to Fire

Software & Assets

  • Godot 3.2
  • SFXR
  • BeepBox
  • Aseprite

This is my first game using Godot and also for my first Game Jam (https://itch.io/jam/8-bitjam). 

The game is basic. Just try to break through the wall and get to the other side. You may either play quickly by disabling the turrets or score more points by destroying more stones. Or, maybe a mix of both strategies!

Leave a comment if you would like to see more levels added!
